name: Stephanie and the Witch's Castle
description:
Help Stephanie save an enchanted island from an evil witch!!!


Stephanie is a special little girl who has the power to restore
the enchanted island. But first she must defeat the evil witch who
has taken over the island.
Stephanie needs your help to jump on enemies, collect hearts and
defeat tough bosses.
CONTROLS:
Arrow keys = Move left or right
X Key = Jump
Z Key and Arrow Keys = Move left or right faster
Escape Key = End the game
Spacebar = Reset the game.
